article_title: Mexican Grocer Soriana: Will Consider Acquisition
article_text:
MEXICO CITY—The head of Mexican grocery chain operator Organización Soriana said Thursday the company plans to study the possible purchase of competitor Controladora Comercial Mexicana, which announced in January that it was in talks with domestic and international companies to explore a potential sale.

"We're not closed to any acquisition," Soriana Chief Executive Ricardo Martín Bringas told analysts during a conference call when asked about Comercial Mexicana. Although his company is deeply committed to organic...
